name: Gravity Control (itch) (AMEiDoX)
description:
2D mouse controled shoot to move rogue-like game

 Your goal is to kill as much ghosts as you can, but you will destroy the terrain with your bullets. to avoid this you will need  to jump into another random deminition  through  the ever expanding portal. BUT there is a problem! the Gravity of the place is unstable!

Every three secounds the gravity  will shift it's direction, unlike games as  VVVVVV

in this game you do not Control the Gravity.

Controls: mouse to aim and left click to shoot.
